greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Main diagonal of A018219, i.e., (n, n, a_n) is a winning position.
link: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := T[n, k] = mex[{f[Table[T[n - i, k], {i, n}]], f[Table[T[n, k - i], {i, k}]], f[Table[T[n - i, k - i], {i, Min[n, k]}]]}];
Table[a[n], {n, 0, 69}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 19 2019, from A018219 Mma code *)
results.author: _Michael Kleber_
ext: Edited and extended by _Christian G. Bower_, Oct 29 2002
